member.name: M:Twajd_Back_End.Api.Controllers.LocationsController.Get
member.summary: Get all Work Hours, used by manager.

member.name: M:Twajd_Back_End.Api.Controllers.LocationsController.Post(Twajd_Back_End.Api.Resources.AddLocationResource)
member.summary: Create new Work Hours, used by manager. StartWork and EndWork are strings: "1:01 AM" or "1:01 PM". FlexibleHour is a double 1.5 mean 1 hour and 30 minutes.

member.summary: Update Work Hours, used by manager. StartWork and EndWork are strings: "1:01 am" or "1:01 pm". FlexibleHour is a double 1.5 mean 1 hour and 30 minutes.

member.name: M:Twajd_Back_End.Api.Controllers.LocationsController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete Work Hours by id, used by manager.
